post:
Hello from [The SkySpace](http://theskyspace.com)!

The SkySpace is a trading name of JCKD (UK) Ltd. Our parent company has been around since 2008 and registered in the UK since 2011.

Our Exclusive Offer
===
We have an exclusive offer which we only post on LET. This offer is:
> **Disk Space:** 75GB<br />
> **Bandwidth:** 750GB<br />
> **Memory:** 3072MB<br />
> **IPv4 Addresses:** 1<br />
> **Uplink:** 1Gbps<br />
> **Price:** $7.00/Month<br />
**[Order Now!!](https://secure.theskyspace.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=27)**


VPS Features
===
* VPS servers are instantly setup.
* Premium network - All our providers are tier 1 and we use a 1Gbps uplink to ensure fast speeds. Our network also has fail-safe redundancy.
* 7 day money back guarantee.
* 24/7 support team to assist with any issues you may have!
* 99.9% uptime guarantee backed by an SLA.
* Enterprise datacenter.
* Choice of Linux OS
* No contracts!
* rDNS/PTR records available.
* Full root access and total control.
* Server grade hardware - All our servers are very powerful quad-core servers that use server grade hardware and RAID technology.
* SolusVM virtualization control panel.
* TUN/TAP support enabled.


General Information
===
* Virtualization Type and Panel: OpenVZ with SolusVM for VPS management
* Payment Methods: PayPal
* Refund Policy: 7 day money back guarantee on all VPS plans

**Network Tests**:

* Download File Test: http://162.221.186.169/1GB.bin
* PING IP: 162.221.186.169

**TOS/AUP Summary**:

* Content/usage of VPS must obey US law.
* IRC not allowed.
* TOR not allowed, but other VPNs welcome.<br />
Full TOS: [Here](http://theskyspace.com/tos.php)<br />
Full AUP: [Here](http://theskyspace.com/aup.php)<br />


Contact Information
===
Website: [http://theskyspace.com](http://theskyspace.com)<br />
Facebook: [https://www.facebook.com/TheSkySpace](https://www.facebook.com/TheSkySpace)<br />
